name: 張致遠
objective:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1) 離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2) Z - 轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3) 相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4) FIR 數位濾波器設計 (5) IIR 數位濾波器設計 (6) 適應性訊號處理介紹 (7) 工程應用及實例研討。
This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1) Discrete-time Fourier Transform and Fast Fourier Transform (2) Z-Transform and its application (3) Correlation Fucntion, Convoluation Integral and its application (4) FIR digital filter design (5) IIR Digital Filter Desgin (6) Adaptive Signal Processing (7) Practical Application
schedule:
Weeks 1-2 Introduction and Backgrounds
Weeks 3-4 Spectrum Representation 　
Weeks 5-6 Sampling and Aliasing 　
Weeks 6-7 FIR Filters
Week 8 Frequency Response of FIR Filters
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Week 10 Frequency Response of FIR Filters. 　
Weeks 11-12 Discrete-Time Fourier Transform  　
Weeks 13-14 Discrete Fourier Transform 　
Weeks 15-16 IIR Filters
Week 17 Z-Transform 　
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
期末考試 40%
作業與課堂表現 30%
materials: DSP First (2nd edition), by James H. McClellan, Ronald W. Schafer, and Mark A. Yoder, Pearson 2017
consultation: 週一週二上午 1100-1200 於綜合科館 214B 或 E-mail 聯絡授課教師 (tofar@mail.ntut.edu.tw) 約定諮詢時間
